Groups and Associations
Connect with the University Senate, resource groups, unions for faculty and staff and other associations and groups.
California Faculty Association
The CFA is the statewide organization that represents the 23,000 professors, lecturers, librarians, counselors and coaches who teach in the CSU system.
California State Employees Association
The CSEA is a coalition of organizations which represent active and retired state employees.
SDSU Retirement Association
The association serves retired and near retired faculty and staff.
University Senate
Learn more about the university governing body for faculty and staff.
Employee Resource Groups
Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) are designed to build an inclusive environment for SDSU employees from various employment groups, with particular attention to employees from historically underrepresented and underserved backgrounds.
Academic Professionals of California
For students attending the California State Universities, Academic Professionals of California (APC) union members share their expertise along every step of students' academic path. We help ensure the quality of an accessible CSU education.
